turn sl1 p15 p2tog p1 turn s1 p15 p2tog p1 turn s1 p17 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k16 ssk turn sl1 k16 ssk k1 turn sl1 k18 ssk k1 turn sl1 p16 p2tog 18 s1 p17 p2tog p1 turn s1 p19 p2tog p1 turn stitches remaining sl1 k18 ssk turn sl1 k20 ssk turn s1 p18 p2tog turn 20 s1 p20 p2tog turn 22 stitches stitches remaining remaining the heel has now been turned you will now start working in the round again gusset knit across the 18 20 22 heel flap stitches pick up and knit one stitch in each of the loops on the edge of the heel flap the exact number of stitches picked up is not important just ensure that one stitch has been picked up for each loop on needle 1 make 1 stitch by inserting needle 1 front to back to pick up the bar between the last stitch on needle 2 and the first stitch on needle 1 place this stitch onto needle 1 then knit it through the back loop work the 28 32 36 stitches on needle 1 in pattern as set on leg with needle 1 make 1 stitch by inserting needle 1 from front to back to pick up the bar between the last stitch on needle 1 and the heel flap place this stitch onto needle 1 then knit it through the back loop you will now work on the heel flap side of the sock pick up and knit one stitch in each of the loops on the edge of the heel flap as with the other side the exact number of stitches picked up is not important just ensure that one stitch has been picked up for each loop knit across the 18 20 22 stitches on the bottom of the heel flap then knit all of the picked-up stitches through the back loop page 4 simple garter rib socks now switch to the top side of the sock knit the first two stitches together the picked-up stitch between the heel and top of the sock and the stitch immediately following it knit in pattern across the top of the sock until the last two stitches the picked-up stitch between the heel and top of the sock and the stitch immediately prior to it then ssk now switch to the heel flap side of the sock knit all of the picked-up stitches through the
